content.html: @Hyolobrika Yes and no. Services such as brid.gy are essential to get webmentions from platforms that don't fully implement microformats such as Twitter, Reddit, etc. Webmention.io is a pretty handy go-between to store webmentions as I'm currently serving a static Jekyll site.
